# UITextCursorView

**Protocol**

An interface you use to draw the insertion point in a piece of text.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor protocol UITextCursorView : UICoordinateSpace
```

## Overview

Adopt the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextCursorView] protocol in a custom view you use to draw the insertion caret in one of your text views. Use your custom view in conjunction with a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextSelectionDisplayInteraction] object to apply your custom selection UI to one of your text views. This protocol provides details about when to display the blink animations. Use [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/QuartzCore/CALayer] objects or your view’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/draw(_:)] method to draw and animate the caret.

After adopting this protocol in your custom view, assign your view to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextSelectionDisplayInteraction/cursorView] property of the interaction object you attached to your text view.

## Determining the animation state

- **isBlinking**: A Boolean value that determines whether the blink animation is running.
- **resetBlinkAnimation()**: Resets the blink animation to avoid glitches while someone is typing.

## Custom text selection

- **Adopting system selection UI in custom text views**: Incorporate the system text-selection experience into your custom text UI in UIKit.
- **UITextSelectionDisplayInteraction**: An object that provides the system UI for displaying text selection.
- **UITextSelectionHighlightView**: An interface you use to provide a custom highlight UI behind the selected text.
- **UITextSelectionHandleView**: An interface you use to draw custom the selection handles for ranges of text.
- **UIStandardTextCursorView**: A view that draws the standard system insertion point in a piece of text.
- **UITextCursorDropPositionAnimator**
- **UITextLoupeSession**: An object that manages the presentation of the system magnifier at the location you specify.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol
- UICoordinateSpace

## Conforming Types

- UIStandardTextCursorView
